divs: sighting detailslol, taking the trash out and looked up and saw this square box with white lights inside, bigger than the moon. i watched it for about two mins and ran into the house for a camera and it was gone! i was floored by this. heard of this type of incident happening in the east coast...... 0322 hours. *(wit's first name deleted--cms\sg)
Summary: Square box with tamper angles on top, white lights
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Grand Junction
There were no other sightings in Grand Junction on or around October 29th 2010
